data.introduce:
手工PNR更新支持用户一次性更新PNR中的FC、FN、FP、EI以及tour code和RMK各项。
目前仅用于手工出票前，针对需要输入的运价项的传入，不支持联动修改和删除。传入运价项后只能手工出票，无法自动出票。
data.business: 提供的服务范围为手工出票前，将各个运价项传入PNR的操作，目前只支持传入，不支持各项的删除以及修改，如需要修改，可以调用D2-AirBookModify的按行删除之后，再通过此服务完成重新添加。
data.functions:
1. 支持传入FC项
2. 支持传入FN项
3. 支持传入FP项文本
4. 支持传入EI项
5. 支持传入TC项
6. 支持传入RMK文本
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirPNRUpdateRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"手工PNR更新请求","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"？","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Office号","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"BookingReferenceID","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PNR号信息","children":[{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PNR","children":[]}]},{"name":"FCInfos","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"FC项","children":[{"name":"FCInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"FC","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"FC横式信息：手动输入FC完整指令","children":[]},{"name":"PassengerNames","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"旅客姓名列表","children":[{"name":"PassengerName","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"旅客姓名","children":[]}]},{"name":"Infant","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"false","description":"婴儿标识","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"FNInfos","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"FN项","children":[{"name":"FNInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"FN","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"fn指令","children":[]},{"name":"Infant","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..1","default":"false","description":"婴儿标识","children":[]},{"name":"PassengerNames","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"旅客姓名组","children":[{"name":"PassengerName","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"旅客姓名","children":[]}]}]}]},{"name":"FPInfos","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"FP项","children":[{"name":"FPInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"FP","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"手动输入FP完整指令","children":[]},{"name":"PassengerNames","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"旅客姓名列表","children":[{"name":"PassengerName","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]},{"name":"CurrencyCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"货币种类，如CNY","children":[]},{"name":"Infant","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..1","default":"false","description":"婴儿标识","children":[]},{"name":"PaymentType","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"支付类型，如CASH","children":[]},{"name":"OtherInfo","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"自由文本","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"EIInfos","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"EI项","children":[{"name":"EIInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Endorse","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"签注信息","children":[]},{"name":"PassengerName","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"Infant","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..1","default":"false","description":"婴儿标识","children":[]},{"name":"InputCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"TCInfos","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"TC项","children":[{"name":"TCInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Infant","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..1","default":"false","description":"婴儿标识","children":[]},{"name":"FreeCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"自由格式TC","children":[]},{"name":"TC","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"标准格式TC","children":[]},{"name":"PassengerName","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"InputCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"RMKInfos","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"RMK项","children":[{"name":"RMKInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"InputCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"RemarkType","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"备注类型","children":[]},{"name":"RemarkInfo","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"备注信息","children":[]},{"name":"PassengerName","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"RefTxnId","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"Infant","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..1","default":"false","description":"婴儿标识","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"@ModificationInfo","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"封口方式","children":[]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirPNRUpdateRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"手工PNR更新返回","children":[{"name":"Errors","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误信息：？","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"？：？","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误详细信息英文","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误详细信息中文","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Result","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"返回：返回，如OK","children":[]}]}]
data.errorCodes: [{"code":403,"name":"","msg":"","msgZh":" 用户名、密码、IP错误或无权限 "},{"code":-303,"name":"","msg":" inner service error ","msgZh":" 内部服务异常 "},{"code":-301,"name":"","msg":" office prermission denied ","msgZh":" 没有office权限 "},{"code":-402,"name":"","msg":" input error ","msgZh":" 输入错误 "}]

qaApiDemos.request:
<TES_AirPNRUpdateRQ>
    <POS>
        <Source PseudoCityCode="BJS191"/>
    </POS>
    <BookingReferenceID ID="KWWW0B"/>
    <FCInfos>
        <FCInfo>
            <FC>FC:BKK LX ZRH 1000.00Y CNY1000.00END</FC>
            <PassengerNames>
                <PassengerName>ZHOU/XIAO</PassengerName>
            </PassengerNames>
            <Infant>false</Infant>
        </FCInfo>
    </FCInfos>
    <FNInfos>
        <FNInfo>
            <FN>FN/FCNY10.00/SCNY10.00/C3.00/TCNY50.00CN/TCNY60.00YQ</FN>
            <Infant>false</Infant>
            <PassengerNames>
                <PassengerName>ZHOU/XIAO</PassengerName>
            </PassengerNames>
        </FNInfo>
    </FNInfos>
    <FPInfos>
        <FPInfo>
            <CurrencyCode>CNY</CurrencyCode>
            <Infant>false</Infant>
            <PaymentType>CASH</PaymentType>
            <OtherInfo>自由文本信息</OtherInfo>
            <PassengerNames>
                <PassengerName>ZHOU/XIAO</PassengerName>
            </PassengerNames>
        </FPInfo>
    </FPInfos>
    <EIInfos>
        <EIInfo>
            <Endorse>endorse</Endorse>
            <PassengerName>ZHOU/XIAO</PassengerName>
            <Infant>false</Infant>
        </EIInfo>
    </EIInfos>
    <TCInfos>
        <TCInfo>
            <Infant>false</Infant>
            <TC>IT1CA1BJS191</TC>
            <PassengerName>ZHOU/XIAO</PassengerName>
        </TCInfo>
    </TCInfos>
    <RMKInfos>
        <RMKInfo>
            <RemarkType>remarkType</RemarkType>
            <RemarkInfo>remarkInfo</RemarkInfo>
            <PassengerName>ZHOU/XIAO</PassengerName>
            <Infant>false</Infant>
        </RMKInfo>
    </RMKInfos>
</TES_AirPNRUpdateRQ>
